org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Class TopologyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.topology.TopologyManager

  • public class TopologyManager
extends Object
    Manages all cluster provisioning actions on the cluster topology.

      • isClusterProvisionWithBlueprintFinished

        public boolean isClusterProvisionWithBlueprintFinished(long clusterId)
        Returns if the provision request for a cluster is finished. Note that this method returns false if the request is not tracked. See isClusterProvisionWithBlueprintTracked(long)
        Parameters:
        clusterId -
        Returns:

      • removePendingHostRequests

        public void removePendingHostRequests(String clusterName,
                                      long requestId)

      • removeHostRequests

        public void removeHostRequests(String hostName)
        Removes topology host requests matched to the given host. If the parent request has no more child host requests, then it is also removed. This is used when hosts are deleted from the cluster.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name for which requests should be removed

      • processAndPersistProvisionClusterTopologyRequest

        protected LogicalRequest processAndPersistProvisionClusterTopologyRequest(ProvisionClusterRequest request,
                                                                          ClusterTopology topology,
                                                                          Long logicalRequestId)
                                                                   throws InvalidTopologyException,
                                                                          org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Creates and persists a PersistedTopologyRequest and a LogicalRequest for the provided provision cluster request and topology.
        Parameters:
        request - Provision cluster request to create a logical request for.
        topology - Cluster topology
        logicalRequestId - The Id for the created logical request
        Returns:
        Logical request created.
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • processAndPersistTopologyRequest

        protected LogicalRequest processAndPersistTopologyRequest(BaseClusterRequest request,
                                                          ClusterTopology topology,
                                                          Long logicalRequestId)
                                                   throws InvalidTopologyException,
                                                          org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Creates and persists a PersistedTopologyRequest and a LogicalRequest for the provided request and topology.
        Parameters:
        request - ProvisionClusterRequest or ScaleClusterRequest to create a logical request for.
        topology - Cluster topology
        logicalRequestId - The Id for the created logical request
        Returns:
        Logical request created.
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • onHostRegistered

        public void onHostRegistered(HostImpl host,
                             boolean associatedWithCluster)

      • onHostHeartBeatLost

        public void onHostHeartBeatLost(Host host)
        Through this method TopologyManager gets notified when a connection to a host in the cluster is lost. The passed host will be excluded from scheduling any tasks onto it as it can't be reached.
        Parameters:
        host -

      • getRequest

        public LogicalRequest getRequest(long requestId)

      • getRequests

        public Collection<LogicalRequest> getRequests(Collection<Long> requestIds)

      • getStages

        public Collection<StageEntity> getStages()
        Currently we are just returning all stages for all requests and relying on the StageResourceProvider to convert each to a resource and do a predicate eval on each.

      • getTasks

        public Collection<HostRoleCommand> getTasks(long requestId)

        public ClusterTopology getClusterTopology(Long clusterId)

      • getPendingHostComponents

        public Map<String,Collection<String>> getPendingHostComponents()
        Gets a map of components keyed by host which have operations in the HostRoleStatus.PENDING state. This could either be because hosts have not registered or becuase the operations are actually waiting to be queued.
        Returns:
        a mapping of host with pending components.

      • processHostRemovedEvent

        public void processHostRemovedEvent(HostsRemovedEvent hostsRemovedEvent)
        Removes a host from the available hosts when the host gets deleted.
        Parameters:
        hostsRemovedEvent - the event containing the hostname
